column2: The Emperor sits at your court. You now hold influence over the entire empire! Congratulations Chancellor.
The Emperor has lost their seat of power and fled to our court. As Chancellor of the Empire you must either relinquish your position or fight to reclaim your Emperor's seat.
You are currently unable to rule by yourself. As such, one of your more popular vassals has been named Chancellor.
Imperial power has waned. As such you have become the Imperial Chancellor. You now hold influence over the entire empire! Congratulations.
